{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Watching television {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Watching television The social aspects of television are influences this mediums had on society since its inception. The belief that this impact has been dramatic has been largely unchallenged in media theory since its inception. However, there is much dispute as to what those effects are, how serious the ramifications are and if these effects are more or less evolutionary with human communication. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Social aspects of television)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
